column5: [font size="1" color="#FF0000"]LAST EDITED ON Mar-21-00 AT 11:53AM (CST)[/font][p]I don't know the rules in canada so hopefully someone can help. I was thinking about buying a VHF radio to use on the Lake of the Woods. Do you think this would be helpful in case of foul weather or breakdowns? Thanks for your thoughts.Sprinter
I hear lots of chatter on the radio on Lake of the Woods so I would think the same rules and regs apply ......
vhf res that apply in US apply in Canada, same channels etc for recreation
